DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether DHA supplement ( daily dose 300 mg ) improve cognitive performance , associate metabolism growth normal child age 6-12 year primary school .
DOC.brief_title: Effect DHA Supplementation Cognitive Performance Growth Chinese Children
